channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Believe In Christmas
channel.desc: When Beatrice reluctantly joins her best friend on a trip to the enchanting Christmasland, she remains sceptical. But festive traditions and a friendly stranger warms her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Holiday Spectacular
channel.desc: This Christmas, journey back to the 1950s, where heiress Maggie is making her dream of dancing on stage in the Christmas Spectacular come true.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Deck The Walls
channel.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas Intern
channel.desc: Newly retired Cecelia visits her daughter, Alexis, who owns an online gift-giving business and becomes an intern. Together, they learn the meaning of Christmas, one gift at a time.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mistletoe In Montana
channel.desc: Cowgirl Merry has been unlucky in love, but is she right to hope that her fortunes have changed when single dad Mark gallops onto her ranch and lassoes her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Joy For Christmas
channel.desc: A publicist introduces a famous athlete to the joys of Christmas in the hopes that he will assist her in saving her family's annual charity. Comedy romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas In Wolf Creek
channel.desc: When a runaway reindeer threatens their annual Christmas play, a dysfunctional couple must work together to save the holidays for the town and each other.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Unforgettable Christmas
channel.desc: When Princess Colette works with designer Wilson James on the collection for a Christmas Eve charity gala, she finds both her true calling and her true love.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Haul Out The Holly
channel.desc: When Emily unexpectedly spends Christmas alone at her parents' house, their Homeowners association vows to get her involved in the neighbourhood festivities.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Jolly Good Christmas
channel.desc: When by-the-book architect David hires free-spirited personal shopper Anji, he finds himself on a wild ride across London in search of the perfect Christmas gift.

channel.title: Teleshopping

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas CEO
channel.desc: The CEO of a small toy company gets a once in a lifetime offer to merge with a huge toy company, but needs her estranged ex-business partner's signature to seal the deal.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Finnish Line
channel.desc: Inspired by her father's legacy, Anya enters Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival and her own anxieties.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sealed With A List
channel.desc: This holiday season, Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Ghosts Of Christmas Always
channel.desc: Katherine is a Ghost of Christmas Present and she must help one soul, Peter, rediscover his Christmas spirit. But this year has something unusual in store.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful...
channel.desc: Mrs Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire after their grandmother's passing.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Mistletoe Secret
channel.desc: Seasonal romance following a ghost writer who arrives in a small town before Christmas and falls for the local Mistletoe Diner's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Stars
channel.desc: When aspiring R&B artist Layla crosses paths with amateur songwriter Spence, she thinks she's found her shot at finally getting a record deal.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wiser Men And A Boy
channel.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mum's new boyfriend.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Happy Holidays From Cherry Lane
channel.desc: In three intertwined timelines, different generations of one family navigate holiday challenges, from caring for an aging father to planning a Christmas Eve wedding.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Great Christmas Switch
channel.desc: A single city girl decides to switch places for Christmas in an effort to get away from their problems for a little while. Romantic comedy.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Twas The Night Before Christmas
channel.desc: Eager to break into directing, former actress Madison takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve play.
